I'm still a fan, but today I was sorely disappointed by the food that they served.  I ordered my favorite - potatoes and 4 cheese.  Usually an ooey gooey mess of potato cheesey goodness. And I also ordered 2 empanadas.  Everything came out COLD.  the outside was warm, but the inside was stone cold.  UGH!!! I love this place so much, and hate to think that their standards have dropped.  Hopefully they just need to get a new oven.I will still be back for more, but skeptically.
